tns:patch.author: dare
tns:patch.description: amp_component_type was removed, but the view v_component_funding was using it, so it created errors. the view has to be changed

script.lang: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW `v_component_funding` AS select `f`.`amp_activity_id` AS `amp_activity_id`,`f`.`amp_component_funding_id` AS `amp_component_funding_id`,`f`.`amp_component_funding_id` AS `amp_fund_detail_id`, cv.category_value as `component_type`,`f`.`transaction_type` AS `transaction_type`,`f`.`adjustment_type` AS `adjustment_type`,`f`.`transaction_date` AS `transaction_date`,`f`.`transaction_amount` AS `transaction_amount`,`f`.`currency_id` AS `currency_id`,`cu`.`currency_code` AS `currency_code` from (((`amp_component_funding` `f` join `amp_components` `c`) join `amp_currency` `cu`) join `amp_category_value` cv) where ((`cu`.`amp_currency_id` = `f`.`currency_id`) and (`f`.`amp_component_id` = `c`.`amp_component_id`)) and (cv.id=c.type) order by `f`.`amp_activity_id`;
